SqlQueries.OTpVarification: SELECT UserId FROM SendSmsOtpDB.dbo.SmsOtpDetail WHERE MobileNumber=@MobileNumber AND Otp=@Otp
SqlQueries.GetMobileOtpDetail: SELECT UserId, MobileNumber, OtpCount, InsertionDate, UpdateDate, (select COUNT(*) from [SendSmsOtpDB].[dbo].[SmsOtpDetail]) as TotalRecord FROM [SendSmsOtpDB].[dbo].[SmsOtpDetail] ORDER BY UpdateDate DESC , InsertionDate DESC OFFSET @Limit ROWS FETCH NEXT @RecordPerPage ROWS ONLY;
